title: Bug 4971Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: When attempting to copy a package in the Eclipse IDE, the destination package is not being selected correctly.
EB: The destination package should be 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of the current selection.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new project in Eclipse.
2. Open the Package Explorer view.
3. Select a package in the project.
4. Right-click on the selected package and choose 'Copy' from the context menu.
5. Ensure that the destination package is set to 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
